pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke today with Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany.  Both leaders agreed on the need to hold those responsible for the use of chemical weapons to account.  In this regard, they affirmed that these shocking chemical attacks cannot be permitted to continue with impunity. They pledged to continue diplomatic efforts with international partners to find a durable political solution to resolve the crisis in Syria.
